p: Yang Q et al. evaluated the antioxidant activity of crude polysaccharides from OD by DPPH assay used response surface methodology (RSM) to optimize the extraction. Their study revealed OD crude polysaccharides had a good antioxidant activity [ 54]. Î²-Sitosterol isolated from OD as the active anti-inflammatory compound seems to be relatively weaker compared with that of hydrocortisone [ 25, 55].
